name: Stellar Diamond
description: Stellar Diamond is a BSC project with an automatic BNB rewarding process. Features: 1. BNB rewards: Wallets with XLD tokens automatically receive BNB every hour, based on the amount of tokens they own. 2. Buyback & burns: Periodically the contract buys tokens from PancakeSwap and burns them immediately. 3. Fees: 16% fee is applied on every transaction
